vocabulary.example: The river was polluted with industrial waste.

vocabulary.definition: convert or be converted into vapor
vocabulary.example: The intense heat caused the ice to vaporize instantly.

vocabulary.definition: tied with a rope or chain
vocabulary.example: The hot air balloon was tethered to the ground to prevent it from flying away.

vocabulary.definition: scattered pieces of waste or remains
vocabulary.example: After the explosion, debris was scattered across the street.

vocabulary.definition: the path followed by an object around a celestial body
vocabulary.example: The satellite completed one full orbit around the Earth.
